title: MF ult is so amazing lol
body:
Mf is so fun guys. try her out!
with 300 ad your ult does 3000 damage if it crits 4500 damage is not impossible.
It feels so amazing to see my enemeis  melting down.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: meanwhile.. Quinn....

> [{quoted}](name=outliving38,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-23T01:34:32.437+0000)
>
> meanwhile.. Quinn....

...... gets her bird ass dunked by MF-Mumu WOMBO PARTY??? You kinda left us hanging here

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-23T01:40:53.151+0000)
>
> ...... gets her bird ass dunked by MF-Mumu WOMBO PARTY??? You kinda left us hanging here

savage

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-23T01:40:53.151+0000)

>
> and here I was hoping to hear Riot was planning on buffing an underplayed champion.

Quinn - underplayed? Isn't she pretty OP this patch?
Valor's pretty underplayed now though. :|

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-23T01:40:53.151+0000)
>
> ...... gets her bird ass dunked by MF-Mumu WOMBO PARTY??? You kinda left us hanging here

This is the most savage red post I have ever seen. Take my upvote sir.
wow thats savage

alot of people are waiting for a dragonslayer skin for a mid laner like yasuo will that ever happen sorry for being rude but i love those skins and was wondering if a mid lane dragonslayer wil come alot of people do will that ever happen ?

> [{quoted}](name=Matua,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000100000007,timestamp=2015-11-23T14:53:31.108+0000)
>
> alot of people are waiting for a dragonslayer skin for a mid laner like yasuo will that ever happen sorry for being rude but i love those skins and was wondering if a mid lane dragonslayer wil come alot of people do will that ever happen ?

I have no idea! Keep asking for it though! We're always looking at player feedback when making decisions about what to do, so if everyone's clamoring for Dragonslayer skins, that makes a pretty good case for creating them :D

That being said, I don't work on the Skins team so I have no clue what's actually happening {{summoner:3}}

Even better if you combo it with Amumu >:D
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Curse of the Sad Bullet Time.

Never forget.
i still remember the game where I set up my team for a 5 man nunu/morgana/katarina/mf ult combo... that was beautiful
get velkoz support and do the channel of glory bot duo.

> [{quoted}](name=Craft Zeppelin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-23T03:00:07.326+0000)
>
> get velkoz support and do the channel of glory bot duo.

Vel'Koz support is my current favorite "support" (heavy emphasis on the air quotes, because I go full damage).
Obligatory: "I'm the captain now" gif request.

Not a gif, unfortunately, but here ya go:
http://i.imgur.com/4QSjiKM.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Pie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-23T00:39:32.631+0000)

> with 300 ad your ult does 3000 damage if it crits 4500 damage is not impossible.

Indeed, and so  much more satisfying to block with {{champion:201}}

> [{quoted}](name=Orbitalightning,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-11-23T18:49:08.876+0000)
>
> Indeed, and so  much more satisfying to block with {{champion:201}}

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/webroot/animatedgifs4/1571978_o.gif

> [{quoted}](name=4NoxiousHours,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-11-23T05:57:01.666+0000)
>
> @Riot Koalifier how does one become a Playtest Analyst?

Oh dear, I'm not one of those any more. I should get that updated. I don't think we're looking for any more playtest analysts, as there isn't a job posting up for it anymore and the team is pretty full now.

At the time that I got the job, the qualification was that you are around D3 - challenger, able to analyze League at a high level, etc. I don't think that's changed, but I don't think we're hiring for any more playtest analysts.

Fun fact that I like to mention to other Rioters all the time and it annoys them; I was an attorney before becoming a playtest analyst, so any kind of background can apply :3

> [{quoted}](name=4NoxiousHours,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-11-23T06:19:08.011+0000)
>
> Why did you ditch being an Attorney for working for Riot?
> 
> and was it hard to get hired in Riot?

To your second question (did you ninja edit that in?). Yes. It was difficult. I first applied... about 3 years ago. I was hired a little less than a year ago. I applied 3 times total.  I was not good enough to get hired the first two times, so I didn't get hired, but I grew a lot and now I'm here :3

> [{quoted}](name=4NoxiousHours,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=00070000000000010001,timestamp=2015-11-23T18:48:23.411+0000)
>
> Lucky af :(

You say lucky, I say 3 years of hard work and self-improvement. Po-tay-toe / po-tah-toe

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0007000000000001,timestamp=2015-11-23T07:02:30.617+0000)
>
> To your second question (did you ninja edit that in?). Yes. It was difficult. I first applied... about 3 years ago. I was hired a little less than a year ago. I applied 3 times total.  I was not good enough to get hired the first two times, so I didn't get hired, but I grew a lot and now I'm here :3

i can only imagine your parents reaction...

> [{quoted}](name=Light deus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=00070000000000010000,timestamp=2015-11-23T08:13:45.528+0000)
>
> i can only imagine your parents reaction...

It was...... more positive than expected? There's a certain satisfaction to doing exactly what your parents can brag about, and then just about-facing and doing something else entirely. I think of it as quite the step up, ofc.

> [{quoted}](name=4NoxiousHours,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-11-23T06:19:08.011+0000)
>
> Why did you ditch being an Attorney for working for Riot?

Seemed like more fun. I enjoyed being an attorney, but I thought this would be a more exciting career path :P

It's really interesting; I see a lot of attorneys/ law students playing this game!  I'm currently applying to law schools with the intention of going into international law, and just recently landed an internship with the Embassy of Canada in D.C. so its nice to see other people in my prospective field (either currently attorneys or were previously) interested in this game as well!

> [{quoted}](name=Sang Noir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-23T20:39:57.076+0000)
>
> It's really interesting; I see a lot of attorneys/ law students playing this game!  I'm currently applying to law schools with the intention of going into international law, and just recently landed an internship with the Embassy of Canada in D.C. so its nice to see other people in my prospective field (either currently attorneys or were previously) interested in this game as well!

Something about that cutthroat competitive nature of law school / League just makes sense... International law is a curious field, I considered it as well before settling on Immigration law. International just encompasses so many possible things. Like, you could go for international humanitarian thingies and spend all of your time looking at international accords and agreements, international trade law stuffs, international contracting (the most interesting imo), etc. etc. I think that most of the actual work is in the international contract negotiation field, but I could be wrong. You could also consider becoming a JAG with the military, which could get you semi-related work. A lot of my classmates went for that. Good luck!

Yeah, international law is interesting!   A class I took on Russian politics is really what sparked my interest in it.  At the embassy, I'll be working in the Congressional and Intergovernmental Affairs section.  In that role I'll be attending congressional hearings and reporting back on matters of interest to Canada and gauging different members of Congress' positions on those issues (softwood lumber, Keystone pipeline, etc.).  I'm really hoping it helps me confirm the field I want to go into.  Thanks for the chat; it's been enlightening!  Would it be alright if I added you in game? :-)

> [{quoted}](name=Sang Noir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-24T00:25:11.488+0000)
>
> Yeah, international law is interesting!   A class I took on Russian politics is really what sparked my interest in it.  At the embassy, I'll be working in the Congressional and Intergovernmental Affairs section.  In that role I'll be attending congressional hearings and reporting back on matters of interest to Canada and gauging different members of Congress' positions on those issues (softwood lumber, Keystone pipeline, etc.).  I'm really hoping it helps me confirm the field I want to go into.  Thanks for the chat; it's been enlightening!  Would it be alright if I added you in game? :-)

Go for it!

Curious... a course in 20th Century Russian history is part of what made me want to go to law school (as well as some international law courses). Russia just has a really interesting history I guess :3
Haha I guess so!!  But we may just be Putin a crazy idea out there.

> [{quoted}](name=Zaphinine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000700000001,timestamp=2015-11-23T18:57:18.151+0000)
>
> Seeing your responses here - you are now my favorite Rioter <3

Yessssssssssss. I'm not sure what I did, but I'll try to keep doing that :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0007000000010000,timestamp=2015-11-23T20:32:16.219+0000)
>
> Yessssssssssss. I'm not sure what I did, but I'll try to keep doing that :P

It's simple, but not easy -- if you post, and you don't get on people's bad sides, people will like you simply because they like interaction with Rioters.
What you did was stuff. Keep doing stuff and eventually it'll work out.
fu ck riot.
gross

How to play Miss Fortune in Teamfights: 
Step 1: Press R
Step 2: There is no step 2, you just won the teamfight, because your ultimate is broken as fuck!

> [{quoted}](name=Raoul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-23T04:50:17.934+0000)
>
> How to play Miss Fortune in Teamfights: 
> Step 1: Press R
> Step 2: There is no step 2, you just won the teamfight, because your ultimate is broken as fuck!

When I'm lagging horribly, this is actually my strategy. I must be doing it wrong though, because I lose before step 2 ;_;

> [{quoted}](name=Raoul,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-23T04:50:17.934+0000)
>
> How to play Miss Fortune in Teamfights: 
> Step 1: Press R
> Step 2: There is no step 2, you just won the teamfight, because your ultimate is broken as fuck!

She can easily have her ult canceled! Be careful <3
Ok, a minimal amount of brain is needed, so that you actually stay somewhere not next to the stun guy...

Forget the Amumu..... you want the realest damages?

{{champion:21}}  + {{champion:161}}  = MELTED ENEMY TEAM

You wanna see what real damage looks like, get your 300 AD MF and 600 AP Support Velkoz to ult an enemy team. You kill them so fast the respawn timer breaks.


Look at tmy crappy match history and examine my velkoz games, I get most damage in the game as support velkoz about 70% of the games I play him. AP mids my be useless...but AP SUPPORTS wreck face.

{{item:2301}}  might just be in the top 5 most broken items Riot has ever released. With this puppy I generally end up with more AP and gold than an AP mid laner.


{{champion:21}} {{champion:161}} 

{{champion:67}} {{champion:34}} 

Are both so broken in bot lane right now it's comical and hardly anyone is playing them.

> [{quoted}](name=3Ez5MeZe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-11-23T17:55:48.692+0000)

> {{champion:67}} {{champion:34}} 
> 
> Are both so broken in bot lane right now it's comical and hardly anyone is playing them.

I mean, I've been playing Vel, but bot lane Anivia sounds just plain dirty...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2015-11-23T20:12:50.506+0000)
>
> I mean, I've been playing Vel, but bot lane Anivia sounds just plain dirty...

Nothing like locking in a first pick support Anivia, then spamming your wall in the middle of lane and making instant Vayne Stuns, which you then follow up with your own stun.



 Not to mention the egg bait tower dives you can pull off. (Start Q,E,E,W,W,R  Then Max R/E/Q/W you really need that second point in the W early other wise when vayne stuns people into the wall they tend to just bounce off it, around it, through, anywhere but into it) 


{{champion:161}} {{item:3020}} {{item:2301}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3089}}  + item of choice (void/Zeke/Hourglass)

{{champion:34}}  {{item:3020}} {{item:2301}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3151}}  + (whatever else you need), or go troll mode {{item:3026}} {{item:3157}} )


I generally opt for going a little tankier with Anivia as oppose to Velkoz since you can bait really hard with it and you don't have the range, I play her more as tower holding zone control  as such I will often run Teleport/Exhaust and tele to lanes so they do not loose their tower, it's not LCS tactics but it sure is fun, where as Velkoz you just pick up the pieces of your feeding mid laner and try to carry them to the nexus over the bodies of your slain enemies.

> [{quoted}](name=3Ez5MeZe,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BUqzEzBl,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2015-11-23T21:22:50.681+0000)

I've generally been getting {{item:3092}} instead of {{item:2301}} because that slow is freakin' massive (40% for 4 seconds??? WHAT OP), but otherwise I'm down for that build. Do you go thunderlord's on Vel? Especially with the 5.23 buffs inc, I'm a huge fan of it.

I love buying Frozen Heart, and sometimes randuins, on anivia, and watching these silly right-clicking champs try to do any damage.
